short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An app for learning all about the solar system and its planets.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a wonderful app for learning all about the solar system, and the planets that call it home.  It has detailed information about all of the planets in the solar system, including the sun.
